text:
3
Educational Television Stations is a division
of the National Association of Educational Broadcasters.
The ETS Program Service was established in 1965/ under grants
from The Kellogg Foundation and the National Home Library
Foundation/ to provide national exchange of outstanding
programs by individual public television stations. By the
end of 1968/ the stations had used some 19,000 programs,
the number which had been originally projected as the total
to be used by the end of 1971.
(END)
